title: The Meadowlark Sings
description: Helen Ruth Schwartz's The Meadowlark Sings traverse uncharted territory at the intersection of sci-fi, fantasy, and feminist politics. Set in the near future, this story recounts the journey of a young woman to an America that now firmly rejects her and "her kind" - homosexuals. Her mission is to share the advanced knowledge that her all-homosexual country of Call has developed, but her quest...is for something more.
author: Helen Ruth Schwartz
